loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "　　　　　                          　设置填写的序号为当前源站序号　　　　　                          　",
    type: "button",
    action: "$()"
  },
  { name: "序号：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "　　　　　                          　设置填写的页数为评论加载页数　　　　　                          　",
    type: "button",
    action: "f()"
  },
  { name: "页数：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "　　　   　                    ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击更新源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻　　　   　                    ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "       查看当前      ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "       查看历史      ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "       恢复默认      ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "       繁体搜索      ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "       简繁转换      ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "       目录整理      ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "　　　   　                    ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻　　　   　                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "     ① 禁漫 ✈️    ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: "     ② 禁漫 ✈️   ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "      ③ 禁漫 ✈️   ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: "     ④ 禁漫 🐰    ", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: "     ⑤ 禁漫 🐰   ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: "      ⑥ 禁漫 🐰   ", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },
  { name: "     ⑦ 禁漫 ⑦      ", type: "button", action: "$(7)" },
  { name: "     ⑧ 禁漫 ⑧     ", type: "button", action: "$(8)" },
  { name: "      ⑨ 禁漫 ⑨     ", type: "button", action: "$(9)" },


  { name: "　　　   　                    ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换线路  ɞ´«ˇ༻　　　   　                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "        线路[1]       ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },
  { name: "        线路[2]       ", type: "button", action: "p(2)" },
  { name: "        线路[3]       ", type: "button", action: "p(3)" },

  {
    name: "　　                  💡　　 源　　 站　　 测　　 试　　 💡　                 　 ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  },
  { name: "     ① 禁漫 ✈️    ", type: "button", action: "test(1)" },
  { name: "     ② 禁漫 ✈️   ", type: "button", action: "test(2)" },
  { name: "      ③ 禁漫 ✈️   ", type: "button", action: "test(3)" },
  { name: "     ④ 禁漫 🐰    ", type: "button", action: "test(4)" },
  { name: "     ⑤ 禁漫 🐰   ", type: "button", action: "test(5)" },
  { name: "      ⑥ 禁漫 🐰   ", type: "button", action: "test(6)" },
  { name: "     ⑦ 禁漫 ⑦      ", type: "button", action: "test(7)" },
  { name: "     ⑧ 禁漫 ⑧     ", type: "button", action: "test(8)" },
  { name: "      ⑨ 禁漫 ⑨     ", type: "button", action: "test(9)" }
]

ruleContent.content:
var data = []; list = java.getElements('.scramble-page.center img'); for (i in list) { pic = String(list[i].attr('data-original')); data.push('
'); } String(data).replace(/>,/g, '>');
